snippet.title: JOYVILLE 2 - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam now - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2963230/Joyville_2
Play Joyville Now - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2490790/Joyville/

Join The Discord Server: https://discord.gg/BMSYG8yrS5
Twitter: https://twitter.com/KudPlay
Join us on Patreon: https://patreon.com/kudplaygames

In the horror atmosphere of Joyville, an abandoned children's camp founded by Harrison Vanderbilt, you'll have to explore it by solving all the puzzles this place has for you and meet its mysterious inhabitants. Surviving is just the beginning of the journey here.
